name: Lawqueen Kanesh
content: Lawqueen KaneshSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationLawqueen KaneshI am working as an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at IIT Indore since April 2025. Previously, I was an assistant professor at IIT Jodhpur.   Before moving to  Jodhpur, I was a postdoctoral researcher at the University of Warwick, UK. Prior to that I was a postdoctoral researcher at the National University of Singapore. I completed my Ph.D. in Theoretical Computer Science from the Institute of Mathematical Sciences, Chennai, India, under the supervision of Prof. Saket Saurabh.My research interests are Parameterized Complexity and Algorithms, Approximation Algorithms, Model Counting, Kernelization, and Graph Theory and Algorithms. Contact details: Department of Computer Science & Engineering,Indian Institute of Technology Indore, Simrol, Khandwa Road, Indore 453552 email: lawqueen at iiti dot ac dot in Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
